TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CollectionAdapters extends System.Object
public ref class CollectionAdapters abstract sealed

summary.span: 讓集合能夠在增益集及其主應用程式之間傳遞。

span.span: Enables collections to be passed between an add-in and its host application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別提供方法，讓要轉換成集合集合。This class provides methods that enable an collection to be converted to a collection. 集合是跨隔離界限傳遞，並轉換回增益集，或從主應用程式可以使用的集合。The collection is passed across the isolation boundary and converted back to an collection that the add-in or the host application can use. 集合中的物件必須可遠端處理。Objects in collections must be remotable. 如需您可以將傳遞的物件類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[合約、 檢視和配接器](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6460173-9507-4b87-8c07-d4ee245d715c)。For more information about the object types that you can pass, see [Contracts, Views, and Adapters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a6460173-9507-4b87-8c07-d4ee245d715c).

span.span: Add-Ins and Extensibility

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<T> ToIList<T> (System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<T> collection);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!T> ToIList<T>(class System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract`1<!!T> collection) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToIList(Of T) (collection As IListContract(Of T)) As IList(Of T)
static member ToIList : System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<'T> -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<'T>

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 清單中所含物件的型別。

span.span: The type of objects that are contained in the list.
must be serializable.

param.name: collection
param.span: 來自管線另一端的集合。

span.span: The collection from the other side of the pipeline.

summary.span: 將指定的 集合轉換為 集合。

span.span: Converts the specified collection to an collection.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主應用程式或增益集可以使用傳回集合。The host application or add-in can use the returned collection. 集合中會有遠端存留期語彙基元集合。The collection will have a lifetime token for the remote collection. 您應該使用這個方法多載時，才內容是可序列化的型別，可以直接傳遞給增益集和主應用程式 （而非必須調整成檢視的型別）。You should use this method overload only when the contents of the are serializable types that can be passed directly to the add-in and host (rather than types that must be adapted into views). ## Examples 下列範例會實作主控件端配接器管線區段所述[逐步解說：主機和增益集之間傳遞集合](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b532c604-548e-4fab-b11c-377257dd0ee5)。此範例配合自訂`ProcessBooks`方法採取集合傳遞從增益集，並將它轉換成集合，然後可以使用主應用程式。The following example implements a host-side adapter pipeline segment as described [Walkthrough: Passing Collections Between Hosts and Add-Ins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b532c604-548e-4fab-b11c-377257dd0ee5). The example adapts the custom `ProcessBooks` method by taking the collection passed from the add-in and converting it to an collection, which the host application can then use. [!code-csharp[AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter/cs/LibraryManagerViewToContractAddInAdapter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineAddInSideAdapter/vb/LibraryManagerViewToContractAddInAdapter.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<TView> ToIList<TContract,TView> (System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<TContract> collection, Converter<TContract,TView> contractViewAdapter, Converter<TView,TContract> viewContractAdapter);

Public Shared Function ToIList(Of TContract, TView) (collection As IListContract(Of TContract), contractViewAdapter As Converter(Of TContract, TView), viewContractAdapter As Converter(Of TView, TContract)) As IList(Of TView)
static member ToIList : System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<'Contract> * Converter<'Contract, 'View> * Converter<'View, 'Contract> -> System.Collections.Generic.IList<'View>

typeparam.name: TContract
typeparam.span: 定義用於跨隔離界限傳遞型別 物件之合約的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the contract for passing objects of type across the isolation boundary.

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: 定義清單中物件檢視的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the view of the objects in the list.

param.name: collection
param.span: 要傳遞至管線另一端的集合。

span.span: The collection to pass to the other side of the pipeline.

param.name: contractViewAdapter
param.span: 轉換子，會將資料的型別從合約中所定義的型別改寫為檢視中所需的型別。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the contract to the type expected in the view.

param.name: viewContractAdapter
param.span: 轉換子，會將資料的型別從檢視中所定義的型別改寫為合約所需的型別。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the view to the type expected by the contract.

summary.span: 使用轉換子配接器，將指定的 集合轉換為 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection by using converter adapters.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法多載包含的類型，必須先調整，才能將它們傳遞到增益集或主應用程式 （而非簡單可以直接傳遞的可序列化型別） 的集合。Use this method overload for collections that contain types that must be adapted before they can be passed to the add-in or host (rather than simple serializable types that can be passed directly). 主應用程式或增益集可以使用傳回集合。The host application or add-in can use the returned collection. 它會有遠端存留期語彙基元。It will have a lifetime token for the remote .

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 清單中所含物件的型別。

span.span: The type of objects that are contained in the list.
must be serializable.
The collection to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的 集合轉換為 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合可以跨越隔離界限，增益集和其主應用程式之間封送處理。The collection can be marshaled across the isolation boundary between the add-in and its host application. 您應該使用這個方法多載時，才內容集合是可序列化的型別，可以直接傳遞給合約 （而非必須改寫為合約的型別）。You should use this method overload only when the contents of the collection are serializable types that can be passed directly to the contract (rather than types that must be adapted into contracts). ## Examples 下列範例會實作定義增益集端配接器管線區段的類別。The following example implements the class that defines an add-in side adapter pipeline segment. 其符合自訂`ProcessBooks`方法，藉由採取集合傳遞從增益集檢視區段，並將它轉換成可以封送處理跨隔離界限，主應用程式的集合。It adapts the custom `ProcessBooks` method by taking the collection passed from the add-in view segment and converting it to an collection that can be marshaled across the isolation boundary to the host. [!code-csharp[AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter/cs/LibraryManagerContractToViewHostAdapter.cs#4)] [!code-vb[AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AddInCollectionPipelineHostSideAdapter/vb/LibraryManagerContractToViewHostAdapter.vb#4)]

static member ToIListContract : System.Collections.Generic.IList<'View> * Converter<'View, 'Contract> * Converter<'Contract, 'View> -> System.AddIn.Contract.IListContract<'Contract>

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: 定義清單中物件檢視的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the view of the objects in the list.

typeparam.name: TContract
typeparam.span: 定義用於跨隔離界限傳遞型別 物件之合約的型別。

span.span: The type that defines the contract for passing objects of type across the isolation boundary.
The collection to convert.

param.name: viewContractAdapter
param.span: 轉換子，會將資料的型別從檢視中所定義的型別改寫為合約所需的型別。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the view to the type expected by the contract.

param.name: contractViewAdapter
param.span: 轉換子，會將資料的型別從合約中所定義的型別改寫為檢視中所需的型別。

span.span: A converter that adapts the data from the type defined in the contract to the type expected in the view.

summary.span: 使用轉換子配接器，將指定的 集合轉換為 集合。

span.span: Converts a specified collection to an collection by using converter adapters.
The converted collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法多載包含的類型，必須調整到合約中，才能將它們傳遞至合約 （而非簡單可以直接傳遞的可序列化型別） 的集合。Use this method overload for collections that contain types that must be adapted into contracts before they can be passed to the contract (rather than simple serializable types that can be passed directly). 集合可以跨越隔離界限的增益集和其主應用程式之間封送處理。The collection can be marshaled across the isolation boundary between an add-in and its host application.
